thread.title: Cool place with awesome people.
thread.title_full: Cool place with awesome people. - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kevinnO5526IQ
title: Cool place with awesome people.
text: I stayed over for two nights and loved the eclectic feel of the hotel. Lots of photo opportunities in the hotel and the proximity to the subway is definitely a plus. Of special mention would be the wonderful service team and I had received a fair amount of assistance from Natasha. She had helped me to locate a nearby garage, sorted out directions for my visit to the Statue of Liberty. Definitely two thumbs up and I would strongly recommend TPF for visitors who aren't looking for a run of the mill place to stay over. I had definitely enjoyed my stay.
